name: Random SiFi game
description:
THIS WAS MADE BY A 10 YEAR OLD PLEASE DONT BE TOXIC.

This is my first game but it is also a demo. Don't expect a real full game that lasts 50 hours this will take 30-60 minuets to complete. ENJOY.

Notice: I can't find away to make the game full screen but if you know please comment the way.

The URL is for my channel. Show some support.
